18918709Di2015UniqueSeparator    int window;Di2015NewLine    LineItem myCurve1;Di2015NewLine    LineItem myCurve2;Di2015NewLine    public void DrawWave(ZedGraphControl zgc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        NAudio.Wave.WaveChannel32 wave = new NAudio.Wave.WaveChannel32(new NAudio.Wave.WaveFileReader(open.FileName));Di2015NewLine        WaveFileReader wavFile = new WaveFileReader(open.FileName);Di2015NewLine        byte[] mainBuffer = new byte[wave.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float fileSize = (float)wavFile.Length / 1048576;Di2015NewLine        if (fileSize < 2)Di2015NewLine            window = 8;Di2015NewLine        else if (fileSize > 2 && fileSize < 4)Di2015NewLine            window = 16;Di2015NewLine        else if (fileSize > 4 && fileSize < 8)Di2015NewLine            window = 32;Di2015NewLine        else if (fileSize > 8 && fileSize < 12)Di2015NewLine            window = 128;Di2015NewLine        else if (fileSize > 12 && fileSize < 20)Di2015NewLine            window = 256;Di2015NewLine        else if (fileSize > 20 && fileSize < 30)Di2015NewLine            window = 512;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            window = 2048;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float[] fbuffer = new float[mainBuffer.Length / window];Di2015NewLine        wave.Read(mainBuffer, 0, mainBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < fbuffer.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fbuffer[i] = (BitConverter.ToSingle(mainBuffer, i * window));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double time = wave.TotalTime.TotalSeconds;Di2015NewLine        GraphPane myPane = zgc.GraphPane;Di2015NewLine        PointPairList list1 = new PointPairList();Di2015NewLine        PointPairList list2 = new PointPairList();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < fbuffer.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list1.Add(i, fbuffer[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        list2.Add(0, 0);Di2015NewLine        list2.Add(time, 0);Di2015NewLine        if (myCurve1 != null && myCurve2 != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            myCurve1.Clear();Di2015NewLine            myCurve2.Clear();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        myCurve1 = myPane.AddCurve(null, list1, Color.Red, SymbolType.None);Di2015NewLine        myCurve1.IsX2Axis = true;Di2015NewLine        myCurve2 = myPane.AddCurve(null, list2, Color.Black, SymbolType.None);Di2015NewLine        myPane.XAxis.Scale.MaxAuto = true;Di2015NewLine        myPane.XAxis.Scale.MinAuto = true;Di2015NewLine        zgc.AxisChange();Di2015NewLine        zgc.Invalidate();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18923091Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace BlahBlah.UtilitiesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class ConcurrentHashSet<T> : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly ReaderWriterLockSlim _lock = new ReaderWriterLockSlim(LockRecursionPolicy.SupportsRecursion);Di2015NewLine        private readonly HashSet<T> _hashSet = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Implementation of ICollection<T> ...ishDi2015NewLine        public bool Add(T item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _lock.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLine                return _hashSet.Add(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_lock.IsWriteLockHeld) _lock.ExitWriteLock();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Clear()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _lock.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLine                _hashSet.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_lock.IsWriteLockHeld) _lock.ExitWriteLock();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Contains(T item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _lock.EnterReadLock();Di2015NewLine                return _hashSet.Contains(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_lock.IsReadLockHeld) _lock.ExitReadLock();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Remove(T item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _lock.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLine                return _hashSet.Remove(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_lock.IsWriteLockHeld) _lock.ExitWriteLock();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int CountDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _lock.EnterReadLock();Di2015NewLine                    return _hashSet.Count;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (_lock.IsReadLockHeld) _lock.ExitReadLock();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region DisposeDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine     if (_lock != null)Di2015NewLine                    _lock.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ~ConcurrentHashSet()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine 18925299Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Task<string> GetData2(string url, string data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    UriBuilder fullUri = new UriBuilder(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(data))Di2015NewLine        fullUri.Query = data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    WebClient client = new WebClient();Di2015NewLine    client.Credentials = CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials;//TODO update as neededDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    client.DownloadStringCompleted += (s, args) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (args.Error != null)Di2015NewLine            tcs.TrySetException(args.Error);Di2015NewLine        else if (args.Cancelled)Di2015NewLine            tcs.TrySetCanceled();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            tcs.TrySetResult(args.Result);Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    client.DownloadStringAsync(fullUri.Uri);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18926537Di2015UniqueSeparator// this instance will be reused across multiple requestsDi2015NewLineprivate static CookieContainer cookieContainer = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string Post(string RequestName, string PostData, out HttpStatusCode ReturnCode)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] byteArray = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(PostData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    WebRequest Request = WebRequest.Create(ChatAPI.Settings.BaseUrl + RequestName);Di2015NewLine    Request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    Request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine    Request.ContentLength = byteArray.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Request.CookieContainer = cookieContainer; // this line is newDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stream dataStream = Request.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine    dataStream.Write(byteArray, 0, byteArray.Length);Di2015NewLine    dataStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    WebResponse response = Request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine    dataStream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ReturnCode = ((HttpWebResponse)response).StatusCode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(dataStream);Di2015NewLine    string returnedData = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    reader.Close();Di2015NewLine    dataStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    response.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return returnedData;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18926788Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar child1 = new List<IDictionary<string, object>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    new Dictionary<string, object> { { "ChildName", "John" }, { "ChildAge", 10 } }Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar child2 = new List<IDictionary<string, object>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    new Dictionary<string, object> { { "ChildName", "Tony" }, { "ChildAge", 12 } }Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar parent = new List<IDictionary<string, object>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    new Dictionary<string, object> Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        { "Name", "Mike" },Di2015NewLine        { "LastName", "Tyson" },Di2015NewLine        { "child1", child1 },Di2015NewLine        { "child2", child2 }Di2015NewLine    },Di2015NewLine    new Dictionary<string, object>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        { "Name", "Lykke" },Di2015NewLine        { "LastName", "Li" },Di2015NewLine        { "child1", child1 },Di2015NewLine    },Di2015NewLine    new Dictionary<string, object>Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        { "Name", "Mike" },Di2015NewLine        { "LastName", "Oldfield" }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCreateTable(parent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic DataTable CreateTable(IEnumerable<IDictionary<string, object>> parents)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var parent in parents)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var children = parent.ValuesDi2015NewLine                             .OfType<IEnumerable<IDictionary<string, object>>>()Di2015NewLine                             .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var length = children.Any() ? children.Length : 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var parentEntries = parent.Where(x => x.Value is string)Di2015NewLine                                  .Repeat(length)Di2015NewLine                                  .ToLookup(x => x.Key, x => x.Value);Di2015NewLine        var childEntries = children.SelectMany(x => x.First())Di2015NewLine                                   .ToLookup(x => x.Key, x => x.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var allEntries = parentEntries.Concat(childEntries)Di2015NewLine                                      .ToDictionary(x => x.Key, x => x.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var headers = allEntries.Select(x => x.Key)Di2015NewLine                                .Except(table.ColumnsDi2015NewLine                                             .Cast<DataColumn>()Di2015NewLine                                             .Select(x => x.ColumnName))Di2015NewLine                                .Select(x => new DataColumn(x))Di2015NewLine                                .ToArray();Di2015NewLine        table.Columns.AddRange(headers);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var addedRows = new int[length];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine            addedRows[i] = table.Rows.IndexOf(table.Rows.Add());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (DataColumn col in table.Columns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object[] columnRows;Di2015NewLine            if (!allEntries.TryGetValue(col.ColumnName, out columnRows))Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < addedRows.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                table.Rows[addedRows[i]][col] = columnRows[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return table;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18926788Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic DataTable CreateTable(IEnumerable<IDictionary<string, object>> parents)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //excuse the meaningless variable namesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var c = parents.FirstOrDefault(x => x.ValuesDi2015NewLine                                         .OfType<IEnumerable<IDictionary<string, object>>>()Di2015NewLine                                         .Any());Di2015NewLine    var p = c ?? parents.FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    if (p == null)Di2015NewLine        return table;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var headers = p.Where(x => x.Value is string)Di2015NewLine                   .Select(x => x.Key)Di2015NewLine                   .Concat(c == null ? Di2015NewLine                           Enumerable.Empty<string>() : Di2015NewLine                           c.ValuesDi2015NewLine                            .OfType<IEnumerable<IDictionary<string, object>>>()Di2015NewLine                            .First()Di2015NewLine                            .SelectMany(x => x.Keys))Di2015NewLine                   .Select(x => new DataColumn(x))Di2015NewLine                   .ToArray();Di2015NewLine    table.Columns.AddRange(headers);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var parent in parents)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var children = parent.ValuesDi2015NewLine                             .OfType<IEnumerable<IDictionary<string, object>>>()Di2015NewLine                             .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var length = children.Any() ? children.Length : 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var parentEntries = parent.Where(x => x.Value is string)Di2015NewLine                                  .Repeat(length)Di2015NewLine                                  .ToLookup(x => x.Key, x => x.Value);Di2015NewLine        var childEntries = children.SelectMany(x => x.First())Di2015NewLine                                   .ToLookup(x => x.Key, x => x.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var allEntries = parentEntries.Concat(childEntries)Di2015NewLine                                      .ToDictionary(x => x.Key, x => x.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var addedRows = Enumerable.Range(0, length)Di2015NewLine                                  .Select(x => newDi2015NewLine                                  {Di2015NewLine                                      relativeIndex = x,Di2015NewLine                                      actualIndex = table.Rows.IndexOf(table.Rows.Add())Di2015NewLine                                  })Di2015NewLine                                  .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (DataColumn col in table.Columns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object[] columnRows;Di2015NewLine            if (!allEntries.TryGetValue(col.ColumnName, out columnRows))Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var row in addedRows)Di2015NewLine                table.Rows[row.actualIndex][col] = columnRows[row.relativeIndex];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return table;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18926879Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DynamicInvokeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<object> Parameters { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    List<string> Paths { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    object Instance { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    Type Type { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DynamicInvoke(string path, params object[] parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Parameters = parameters.ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Paths = path.Split('+').ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type = AppDomain.CurrentDomainDi2015NewLine                        .GetAssemblies()Di2015NewLine                        .Where(x => x.GetName().Name == Paths[0])Di2015NewLine                        .First()Di2015NewLine                        .GetTypes()Di2015NewLine                        .Where(x => x.FullName == Paths[1])Di2015NewLine                        .First();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Instance = Activator.CreateInstance(Type, Parameters.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T DynamicPropertyGet<T>()Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        return (T)Type.GetProperty(Paths[2]).GetValue(Instance, null);            Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DynamicPropertySet(object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type.GetProperty(Paths[2]).SetValue(Instance, value, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T DynamicMethodInvoke<T>(params object[] parameters)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        return (T)Type.GetMethods()Di2015NewLine                      .Where(x => x.Name == Paths[2] && AreAllEqual(x, parameters))                          Di2015NewLine                      .First()Di2015NewLine                      .Invoke(Instance, parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool AreAllEqual(MethodInfo method, params object[] parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var p1 = method.GetParameters().Select(x => x.ParameterType);Di2015NewLine        var p2 = parameters.Select(x => x.GetType());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var except1 = p1.Except(p2).ToList().Count;Di2015NewLine        var except2 = p2.Except(p1).ToList().Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (except1 > 0 || except2 > 0) ? false : true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18927213Di2015UniqueSeparator// remove "this" if not on C# 3.0 / .NET 3.5Di2015NewLinepublic static DataTable ToDataTable<T>(this IList<T> data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    PropertyDescriptorCollection props =Di2015NewLine        TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    DataTable table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0 ; i < props.Count ; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyDescriptor prop = props[i];Di2015NewLine        table.Columns.Add(prop.Name, prop.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    object[] values = new object[props.Count];Di2015NewLine    foreach (T item in data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            values[i] = props[i].GetValue(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        table.Rows.Add(values);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return table;        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18928479Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing (var context = new TestEntities())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string procname = "GetPrograms";Di2015NewLine    // context has method GetPrograms(int? id)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Method1 - use the method on the contextDi2015NewLine    // This won't work dynamicallyDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<GetPrograms_Result> result1 = context.GetPrograms(4);Di2015NewLine    result1.Dump("Method1");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Method2 - use reflection to get and use the method on the contextDi2015NewLine    // Building your parameters needs to be in the order they are on the methodDi2015NewLine    // This gets you an IEnumerable, but not a strongly typed oneDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MethodInfo method = context.GetType().GetMethod(procname);Di2015NewLine    method.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine    List<object> parameters = new List<object>();Di2015NewLine    parameters.Add(4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable result2 = (IEnumerable) method.Invoke(context,parameters.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    result2.Dump("Method2");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Method3 - make a SqlQuery call on a common return type, passing a dynamic listDi2015NewLine    // of SqlParameters.  This return type can be but dows not need to be an Entity typeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var argList = new List<SqlParameter>();Di2015NewLine    argList.Add(new SqlParameter("@id",4));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    object[] prm = argList.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    var csv = String.Join(",",argList.Select (l => l.ParameterName));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<GetPrograms_Result> result3 = context.Database.SqlQuery<GetPrograms_Result>("exec " + procname + " " + csv ,prm);Di2015NewLine    result3.Dump("Method3");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18929644Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass InventoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // this is inventory storage;Di2015NewLine    // collection allows the storage to be extended later, or be displayed at onceDi2015NewLine    // (e.g., some ShowAllInventory method)Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<Item> inventoryItems;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Inventory()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        inventoryItems = new List<Item>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // some predefined inventory slots with default inventory itemsDi2015NewLine            new Chest(),Di2015NewLine            new Helmet(),Di2015NewLine            new Melee(),Di2015NewLine            new Ranged()Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // these properties are required, if you want to access predefined Di2015NewLine    // inventory slots in strongly-typed manner; they are NOT required for comparisonDi2015NewLine    public Chest ChestSlotDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (Chest)inventoryItems[0]; }Di2015NewLine        set { inventoryItems[0] = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Ranged RangedSlotDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (Ranged)inventoryItems[3]; }Di2015NewLine        set { inventoryItems[3] = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The comparison.Di2015NewLine    public void Compare(Item newItem)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in inventoryItems)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (item.CanCompareWith(newItem))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                item.CompareWith(newItem);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18931975Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression
18931975Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace GetTypeTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class FindMe { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var assemblyName = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().FullName;Di2015NewLine            var className = "System.Linq.Expressions.Expression";//"GetTypeTest.FindMe";Di2015NewLine            var classAndAssembly = string.Format("{0}, {1}", className, assemblyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // 1) GetType succeeds when input is "class, assembly", using method groupDi2015NewLine            var result = new[] { classAndAssembly }.Select(Type.GetType).ToArray();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("1) Method group & class+assembly: {0}, {1}", result.First(), result.First().Assembly);//your assemblyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // 2) GetType fails when input is just the class name, using method groupDi2015NewLine            var result2 = new[] { className }.Select(Type.GetType).ToArray();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("2) Method group & class name only: {0}, {1}", result2.First(), result2.First().Assembly);//System.Core assemblyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // 3) Identical to (2) except using lamba expression - this succeeds...Di2015NewLine            var result3 = new[] { className }.Select(s => Type.GetType(s)).ToArray();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("3) Lambda expression & class name only: {0}, {1}", result3.First(), result3.First().Assembly);//your assemblyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // 4) Method group and core type class nameDi2015NewLine            var result4 = new[] { "System.String" }.Select(Type.GetType).ToArray();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("4) Method group for System.String: {0}, {1}", result4.First(), result4.First().Assembly);//mscorlib assemblyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace System.Linq.ExpressionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class ExpressionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18933397Di2015UniqueSeparatorWhere
18933397Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> GetNew<TId, T>(IQueryable<T> objects, TId id, DateTime date, Expression<Func<T, TId>> idSelector)Di2015NewLine    where T : class, ISyncable<TId>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var paramExpr = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    var idEqExpr = Expression.Equal(Expression.Invoke(idSelector, paramExpr), Expression.Constant(id));Di2015NewLine    var createdPropExpr = Expression.Property(paramExpr, "CreatedDate");Di2015NewLine    var gtExpr = Expression.GreaterThan(createdPropExpr, Expression.Constant(date));Di2015NewLine    var andExpr = Expression.And(idEqExpr, gtExpr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var condExpr = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(andExpr, paramExpr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return objects.Where(condExpr);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18938444Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct MutableStructDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Foo { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Foo.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var foo = typeof(MutableStruct).GetProperty("Foo");Di2015NewLine    var setFoo = foo.SetMethod;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var dynMtd = new DynamicMethod("Evil", typeof(void), new [] { typeof(object), typeof(int) });Di2015NewLine    var il = dynMtd.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);                       // objectDi2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Unbox, typeof(MutableStruct));  // MutableStruct&Di2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1);                       // MutableStruct& intDi2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Call, setFoo);                  // --empty--Di2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);                           // --empty--Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var del = (Action<object, int>)dynMtd.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<object, int>));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var mut = new MutableStruct { Foo = 123 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var boxed= (object)mut;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    del(boxed, 456);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var unboxed = (MutableStruct)boxed;Di2015NewLine    // unboxed.Foo = 456, mut.Foo = 123Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18951126Di2015UniqueSeparatorWaveFileWriter

18951126Di2015UniqueSeparator_waveOutFile
18951126Di2015UniqueSeparator_waveOut.WaveFormat
18951126Di2015UniqueSeparator[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Explicity)]Di2015NewLineinternal struct UnionStructDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [FieldOffset(0)]Di2015NewLine    public byte[] bytes;Di2015NewLine    [FieldOffset(0)]Di2015NewLine    public float[] floats;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static byte[] Float32toInt16(byte[] data, int offset, int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    UnionStruct u = new UnionStruct();Di2015NewLine    int nSamples = length / 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (offset == 0)Di2015NewLine        u.bytes = data;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        u.bytes = new byte[nSamples * 4];Di2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(data, offset, u.bytes, 0, nSamples * 4);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    byte[] res = new byte[nSamples * 2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (i = 0, o = 0; i < nSamples; i++, o+= 2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        short val = (short)(u.floats[i] * short.MaxValue);Di2015NewLine        res[o] = (byte)(val & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine        res[o + 1] = (byte)((val >> 8) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    u.bytes = null;Di2015NewLine    return res;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18952430Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ItemsRenderer : FrameworkElementDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private bool _isLoaded;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ItemsRenderer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Loaded += OnLoaded;Di2015NewLine        Unloaded += OnUnloaded;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnLoaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs routedEventArgs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _isLoaded = true;Di2015NewLine        if (IsAnimating)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnUnloaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs routedEventArgs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _isLoaded = false;Di2015NewLine        Stop();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsAnimatingDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (bool)GetValue(IsAnimatingProperty); 18953894Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class StringExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<string> GetMostCommonSubstrings(this IList<string> strings)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (strings == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("strings");Di2015NewLine        if (!strings.Any() || strings.Any(s => string.IsNullOrEmpty(s)))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("None string must be empty", "strings");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var allSubstrings = new List<List<string>>();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < strings.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var substrings = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine            string str = strings[i];Di2015NewLine            for (int c = 0; c < str.Length - 1; c++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int cc = 1; c + cc <= str.Length; cc++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string substr = str.Substring(c, cc);Di2015NewLine                    if (allSubstrings.Count < 1 || allSubstrings.Last().Contains(substr))Di2015NewLine                        substrings.Add(substr);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            allSubstrings.Add(substrings);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (allSubstrings.Last().Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var mostCommon = allSubstrings.Last()Di2015NewLine                .GroupBy(str => str)Di2015NewLine                .OrderByDescending(g => g.Key.Length)Di2015NewLine                .ThenByDescending(g => g.Count())Di2015NewLine                .Select(g => g.Key);Di2015NewLine            return mostCommon;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Enumerable.Empty<string>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18953894Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetLongestCommonSubstring(this IList<string> strings)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (strings == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("strings");Di2015NewLine    if (!strings.Any() || strings.Any(s => string.IsNullOrEmpty(s)))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("None string must be empty", "strings");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var commonSubstrings = new HashSet<string>(strings[0].GetSubstrings());Di2015NewLine    foreach (string str in strings.Skip(1))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        commonSubstrings.IntersectWith(str.GetSubstrings());Di2015NewLine        if (commonSubstrings.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return commonSubstrings.OrderByDescending(s => s.Length).First();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<string> GetSubstrings(this string str)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(str))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("str must not be null or empty", "str");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int c = 0; c < str.Length - 1; c++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int cc = 1; c + cc <= str.Length; cc++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return str.Substring(c, cc);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18957562Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int solution(int[] A)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int N = A.Length;Di2015NewLine    if (N < 1) return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int max = 0;Di2015NewLine    int result = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(int i = N-1; i >= 0; --i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(A[i] > max)Di2015NewLine            max = A[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var tmpResult = max - A[i];        Di2015NewLine        if(tmpResult > result)Di2015NewLine            result = tmpResult;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

            var settings = new XmlWriterSettings { Indent = true };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine                using , new DataContractSerializerSettings() { DataContractSurrogate = new ImmutableSurrogateSerializer() }Di2015NewLine                          );Di2015NewLine System.Runtime.Serialization;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ReactiveUI.ExtDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ImmutableListListConverter<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static ImmutableList<T> ToImmutable( List<T> list )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ImmutableList<T>.Empty.AddRange(list);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static List<T> ToList(ImmutableList<T> list){Di2015NewLine            return list.ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static object ToImmutable( object list )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ToImmutable(( List<T> ) list);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static object ToList(object list){Di2015NewLine            return ToList(( ImmutableList<T> ) list);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static class ImmutableListListConverter {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static ConcurrentDictionary<Tuple<string, Type>, Func<object,object>> _MethodCache Di2015NewLine            = new ConcurrentDictionary<Tuple<string, Type>, Func<object,object>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static Func<object,object> CreateMethod( string name, Type genericType )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var key = Tuple.Create(name, genericType);Di2015NewLine            if ( !_MethodCache.ContainsKey(key) )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _MethodCache[key] = typeof(ImmutableListListConverter<>)Di2015NewLine                    .MakeGenericType(new []{genericType})Di2015NewLine                    .GetMethod(name, new []{typeof(object)})Di2015NewLine                    .MakeLambda();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return _MethodCache[key];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public static Func<object,object> ToImmutableMethod( Type targetType )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ImmutableListListConverter.CreateMethod("ToImmutable", targetType.GenericTypeArguments[0]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static Func<object,object> ToListMethod( Type targetType )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ImmutableListListConverter.CreateMethod("ToList", targetType.GenericTypeArguments[0]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static Func<object,object> MakeLambda(this MethodInfo method )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (Func<object,object>) method.CreateDelegate(Expression.GetDelegateType(Di2015NewLine            (from parameter in method.GetParameters() select parameter.ParameterType)Di2015NewLine            .Concat(new[] { method.ReturnType })Di2015NewLine            .ToArray()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class ImmutableSurrogateSerializer : IDataContractSurrogateDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static ConcurrentDictionary<Type, Type> _TypeCache = new ConcurrentDictionary<Type, Type>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Type GetDataContractType( Type targetType )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ( _TypeCache.ContainsKey(targetType) )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return _TypeCache[targetType];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               = typeof(List<>).MakeGenericType(targetType.GetGenericArguments());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return targetType;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object GetDeserializedObject( object obj, Type targetType )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ( _TypeCache.ContainsKey(targetType) )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               return ImmutableListListConverter.ToImmutableMethod(targetType)(obj);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return obj;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object GetObjectToSerialize( object obj, Type targetType )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ( targetType.IsGenericType && targetType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(ImmutableList<>) )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               return ImmutableListListConverter.ToListMethod(targetType)(obj);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return obj;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object 18964723Di2015UniqueSeparator    public ActionResult Index()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return View();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FileStreamResult CreatePDF()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stream fileStream = GeneratePDF();Di2015NewLine        HttpContext.Response.AddHeader("content-disposition", "inline; filename=MyPDF.pdf");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var fileStreamResult = new FileStreamResult(fileStream, "application/pdf");Di2015NewLine        return fileStreamResult;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Stream GeneratePDF()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rect = new Rectangle(288f, 144f);Di2015NewLine        var document = new Document(rect, 10, 10, 10, 10);Di2015NewLine        document.SetPageSize(PageSize.LETTER.Rotate());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        PdfWriter pdfWriter = PdfWriter.GetInstance(document, memoryStream);Di2015NewLine        document.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ////////////////////////Di2015NewLine        //Place Image in a Specific (Absolute) LocationDi2015NewLine        ////////////////////////Di2015NewLine        Image myImage = Image.GetInstance(Server.MapPath("../Content/BI_logo_0709.png"));Di2015NewLine        myImage.SetAbsolutePosition(45, 45);Di2015NewLine        //[dpi of page]/[dpi of image]*100=[scale percent]Di2015NewLine        //72 / 200 * 100 = 36%Di2015NewLine        //myImage.ScalePercent(36f);Di2015NewLine        myImage.ScalePercent(36f);Di2015NewLine        document.Add(myImage);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ////////////////////////Di2015NewLine        //Place Text in a Specific (Absolute) LocationDi2015NewLine        ////////////////////////Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Create a table to hold everythingDi2015NewLine        PdfPTable myTable = new PdfPTable(1);Di2015NewLine        myTable.TotalWidth = 200f;Di2015NewLine        myTable.LockedWidth = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Create a paragraph with the text to be placedDi2015NewLine        BaseFont bfArialNarrow = BaseFont.CreateFont(Server.MapPath("../Content/ARIALN.ttf"), BaseFont.CP1252, BaseFont.EMBEDDED);Di2015NewLine        var basicSmaller = new Font(bfArialNarrow, 10);Di2015NewLine        var myString = "Hello World!" +Di2015NewLine                            Environment.NewLine +Di2015NewLine                            "Here is more text." +Di2015NewLine                            Environment.NewLine +Di2015NewLine                            "Have fun programming!";Di2015NewLine        var myParagraph = new Paragraph(myString, basicSmaller);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Create a cell to hold the text aka paragraphDi2015NewLine        PdfPCell myCell = new PdfPCell(myParagraph);Di2015NewLine        myCell.Border = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Add the cell to the tableDi2015NewLine        myTable.AddCell(myCell);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Add the table to the document in a specific (absolute) locationDi2015NewLine        myTable.WriteSelectedRows(0, -1, 550, 80, pdfWriter.DirectContent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        pdfWriter.CloseStream = false;Di2015NewLine        document.Close();Di2015NewLine        memoryStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        return memoryStream;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            protected override ValidationResult IsValid(object value, ValidationContext validationContext)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine                        BooleanSwitch + " is not a valid boolean property for " + validationContext.ObjectType.Name,Di2015NewLine                        BooleanSwitch);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if ((bool) property.GetValue(validationContext.ObjectInstance, null) &&Di2015NewLine                    (value == null || (!AllowEmptyStrings && value is string && String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(value as 18968251Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Bitmap ImageFade( Bitmap sourceBitmap, byte Transparency)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BitmapData sourceData = sourceBitmap.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0,Di2015NewLine                                    sourceBitmap.Width, sourceBitmap.Height),Di2015NewLine                                    ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] pixelBuffer = new byte[sourceData.Stride * sourceData.Height];Di2015NewLine        byte[] resultBuffer = new byte[sourceData.Stride * sourceData.Height];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(sourceData.Scan0, pixelBuffer, 0, pixelBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sourceBitmap.UnlockBits(sourceData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte blue = 0;Di2015NewLine        byte green = 0;Di2015NewLine        byte red = 0;Di2015NewLine        byte a = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int byteOffset = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int offsetY = 0; offsetY <Di2015NewLine             sourceBitmap.Height; offsetY++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int offsetX = 0; offsetX <Di2015NewLine                 sourceBitmap.Width; offsetX++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                blue = 0;Di2015NewLine                green = 0;Di2015NewLine                red = 0;Di2015NewLine                a = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                byteOffset = offsetY *Di2015NewLine                                sourceData.Stride +Di2015NewLine                                offsetX * 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                blue += pixelBuffer[byteOffset];Di2015NewLine                green += pixelBuffer[byteOffset + 1];Di2015NewLine                red += pixelBuffer[byteOffset + 2];Di2015NewLine                a += Transparency;//pixelBuffer[byteOffset + 3];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                resultBuffer[byteOffset] = blue;Di2015NewLine                resultBuffer[byteOffset + 1] = green;Di2015NewLine                resultBuffer[byteOffset + 2] = red;Di2015NewLine                resultBuffer[byteOffset + 3] = a;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Bitmap resultBitmap = new Bitmap(sourceBitmap.Width, sourceBitmap.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BitmapData resultData = resultBitmap.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0,Di2015NewLine                                resultBitmap.Width, resultBitmap.Height),Di2015NewLine                                ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(resultBuffer, 0, resultData.Scan0, resultBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        resultBitmap.UnlockBits(resultData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return resultBitmap;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18979635Di2015UniqueSeparatorms-local-stream
18979635Di2015UniqueSeparatorgetContent
18979635Di2015UniqueSeparatorStreamUriWinRTResolver
18979635Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class StreamUriWinRTResolver : IUriToStreamResolverDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The entry point for resolving a Uri to a stream.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="uri"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public IAsyncOperation<IInputStream> UriToStreamAsync(Uri uri)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (uri == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        string path = uri.AbsolutePath;Di2015NewLine        // Because of the signature of this method, it can't use await, so we Di2015NewLine        // call into a separate helper method that can use the C# await pattern.Di2015NewLine        return getContent(path).AsAsyncOperation();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Helper that maps the path to package content and resolves the UriDi2015NewLine    /// Uses the C# await pattern to coordinate async operationsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private async Task<IInputStream> getContent(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // We use a package folder as the source, but the same principle should applyDi2015NewLine        // when supplying content from other locationsDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Don't use "ms-appdata:///" on the scheme string, because inside the pathDi2015NewLine            // will contain "/local/MyFolderOnLocal/index.html"Di2015NewLine            string scheme = "ms-appdata://" + path;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Uri localUri = new Uri(scheme);Di2015NewLine            StorageFile f = await StorageFile.GetFileFromApplicationUriAsync(localUri);Di2015NewLine            IRandomAccessStream stream = await f.OpenAsync(FileAccessMode.Read);Di2015NewLine            return stream.GetInputStreamAt(0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception) { throw new Exception("Invalid path"); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18979635Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override void OnNavigatedTo(NavigationEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The 'Host' part of the URI for the ms-local-stream protocol needs to be a combination of the package nameDi2015NewLine    // and an application-defined key, which identifies the specific resolver, in this case 'MyTag'.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Uri url = wv.BuildLocalStreamUri("MyTag", "/local/MyFolderOnLocal/index.html");Di2015NewLine    StreamUriWinRTResolver myResolver = new StreamUriWinRTResolver();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Pass the resolver object to the navigate call.Di2015NewLine    wv.NavigateToLocalStreamUri(url, myResolver);Di2015NewLine    wv.ScriptNotify += wv_ScriptNotify;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected override void wv_ScriptNotify(object sender, NavigationEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (e.CallingUri.Scheme == "ms-local-stream")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Do your work here...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18983677Di2015UniqueSeparatorchrome
18983677Di2015UniqueSeparator// there are always multiple chrome processes, so we have to loop through all of them to find theDi2015NewLine// process with a Window Handle and an automation element of name "Address and search bar"Di2015NewLineProcess[] procsChrome = Process.GetProcessesByName("chrome");Di2015NewLineforeach (Process chrome in procsChrome) {Di2015NewLine  // the chrome process must have a windowDi2015NewLine  if (chrome.MainWindowHandle == IntPtr.Zero) {Di2015NewLine    continue;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // find the automation elementDi2015NewLine  AutomationElement elm = AutomationElement.FromHandle(chrome.MainWindowHandle);Di2015NewLine  AutomationElement elmUrlBar = elm.FindFirst(TreeScope.Descendants,Di2015NewLine    new PropertyCondition(AutomationElement.NameProperty, "Address and search bar"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // if it can be found, get the value from the URL barDi2015NewLine  if (elmUrlBar != null) {Di2015NewLine    AutomationPattern[] patterns = elmUrlBar.GetSupportedPatterns();Di2015NewLine    if (patterns.Length > 0) {Di2015NewLine      ValuePattern val = (ValuePattern)elmUrlBar.GetCurrentPattern(patterns[0]);Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("Chrome URL found: " + val.Current.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18983677Di2015UniqueSeparator// there are always multiple chrome processes, so we have to loop through all of them to find theDi2015NewLine// process with a Window Handle and an automation element of name "Address and search bar"Di2015NewLineProcess[] procsChrome = Process.GetProcessesByName("chrome");Di2015NewLineforeach (Process chrome in procsChrome) {Di2015NewLine  // the chrome process must have a windowDi2015NewLine  if (chrome.MainWindowHandle == IntPtr.Zero) {Di2015NewLine    continue;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // find the automation elementDi2015NewLine  AutomationElement elm = AutomationElement.FromHandle(chrome.MainWindowHandle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // manually walk through the tree, searching using TreeScope.Descendants is too slow (even if it's more reliable)Di2015NewLine  AutomationElement elmUrlBar = null;Di2015NewLine  try {Di2015NewLine    // walking path found using inspect.exe (Windows SDK) for Chrome 31.0.1650.63 m (currently the latest stable)Di2015NewLine    var elm1 = elm.FindFirst(TreeScope.Children, new PropertyCondition(AutomationElement.NameProperty, "Google Chrome"));Di2015NewLine    if (elm1 == null) { continue; } // not the right chrome.exeDi2015NewLine    // here, you can optionally check if Incognito is enabled:Di2015NewLine    //bool bIncognito = TreeWalker.RawViewWalker.GetFirstChild(TreeWalker.RawViewWalker.GetFirstChild(elm1)) != null;Di2015NewLine    var elm2 = TreeWalker.RawViewWalker.GetLastChild(elm1); // I don't know a Condition for this for finding :(Di2015NewLine    var elm3 = elm2.FindFirst(TreeScope.Children, new PropertyCondition(AutomationElement.NameProperty, ""));Di2015NewLine    var elm4 = elm3.FindFirst(TreeScope.Children, new PropertyCondition(AutomationElement.ControlTypeProperty, ControlType.ToolBar));Di2015NewLine    elmUrlBar = elm4.FindFirst(TreeScope.Children, new PropertyCondition(AutomationElement.ControlTypeProperty, ControlType.Custom));Di2015NewLine  } catch {Di2015NewLine    // Chrome has probably changed something, and above walking needs to be modified. :(Di2015NewLine    // put an assertion here or something to make sure you don't miss itDi2015NewLine    continue;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // make sure it's validDi2015NewLine  if (elmUrlBar == null) {Di2015NewLine    // it's not..Di2015NewLine    continue;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // elmUrlBar is now the URL bar element. we have to make sure that it's out of keyboard focus if we want to get a valid URLDi2015NewLine  if ((bool)elmUrlBar.GetCurrentPropertyValue(AutomationElement.HasKeyboardFocusProperty)) {Di2015NewLine    continue;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // there might not be a valid pattern to use, so we have to make sure we have oneDi2015NewLine  AutomationPattern[] patterns = elmUrlBar.GetSupportedPatterns();Di2015NewLine  if (patterns.Length == 1) {Di2015NewLine    string ret = "";Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine      ret = ((ValuePattern)elmUrlBar.GetCurrentPattern(patterns[0])).Current.Value;Di2015NewLine    } catch { }Di2015NewLine    if (ret != "") {Di2015NewLine      // must match a domain name (and possibly "https://" in front)Di2015NewLine      if (Regex.IsMatch(ret, @"^(https:\\/\\/)?[a-zA-Z0-9\\-\\.]+(\\.[a-zA-Z]{2,4}).*$")) {Di2015NewLine        // prepend http:// to the url, because Chrome hides it if it's not SSLDi2015NewLine        if (!ret.StartsWith("http")) {Di2015NewLine          ret = "http://" + ret;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Open Chrome URL found: '" + ret + "'");Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    continue;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18984682Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override void OnTextChanged(TextChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var changeList = e.Changes.ToList();Di2015NewLine    if (changeList.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var change in changeList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TextPointer start = null;Di2015NewLine            TextPointer end = null;Di2015NewLine            if (change.AddedLength > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                start = this.Document.ContentStart.GetPositionAtOffset(change.Offset);Di2015NewLine                end = this.Document.ContentStart.GetPositionAtOffset(change.Offset + change.AddedLength);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int startOffset = Math.Max(change.Offset - change.RemovedLength, 0);Di2015NewLine                start = this.Document.ContentStart.GetPositionAtOffset(startOffset);Di2015NewLine                end = this.Document.ContentStart.GetPositionAtOffset(change.Offset);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (start != null && end != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var range = new TextRange(start, end);Di2015NewLine                range.ApplyPropertyValue(FrameworkElement.LanguageProperty, Document.Language);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    base.OnTextChanged(e);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18987361Di2015UniqueSeparator    private const int MAX_RETRIES = 100;Di2015NewLine    private const int MAX_RETRY_SECONDS = 120;Di2015NewLine    public static bool IsFileReady(String sFilename)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int tryNumber = 0;Di2015NewLine        DateTime endTime = DateTime.Now + new TimeSpan(0, 0, MAX_RETRY_SECONDS);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (tryNumber < MAX_RETRIES && DateTime.Now < endTime)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (FileStream inputStream = File.Open(sFilename, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.None))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (inputStream.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Swallow ExceptionDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Slow down the looping Di2015NewLine            System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryNumber += 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18987605Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Splits an array into several smaller arrays.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T">The type of the array.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="array">The array to split.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="size">The size of the smaller arrays.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>An array containing smaller arrays.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Split<T>(this T[] array, int size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < (float)array.Length / size; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return array.Skip(i * size).Take(size);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18987605Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T[,] ToSquare2D<T>(this T[] array, int size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var buffer = new T[(int)Math.Ceiling((double)array.Length/size), size];Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < (float)array.Length / size; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (var j = 0; j < size; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            buffer[i, j] = array[i + j];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return buffer;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18988597Di2015UniqueSeparatorStringBuilder
18988597Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int DisplaySize = 10000;Di2015NewLineStringBuilder fifo = new StringBuilder(2 * DisplaySize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring AppendToFifo( string s )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (s.Length >= DisplaySize) {Di2015NewLine        // FACT: the display will only include data from sDi2015NewLine        // therefore, toss the entire buffer, and only keep the tail of sDi2015NewLine        fifo.Clear();Di2015NewLine        fifo.Append(s, s.Length - DisplaySize, DisplaySize);Di2015NewLine        return fifo.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (fifo.Length + s.Length > fifo.Capacity) {Di2015NewLine        // FACT: we will overflow the fifoDi2015NewLine        // therefore, keep only data in the fifo that remains on the displayDi2015NewLine        fifo.Remove(0, fifo.Length + s.Length - DisplaySize);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    fifo.Append(s);Di2015NewLine    if (fifo.Length <= DisplaySize) {Di2015NewLine        // FACT: the entire fifo content fits on the displayDi2015NewLine        // therefore, send it allDi2015NewLine        return fifo.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // FACT: the fifo content exceed the display sizeDi2015NewLine    // therefore, extract just the tailDi2015NewLine    return fifo.ToString(fifo.Length - DisplaySize, DisplaySize);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

DataTable BuildDataTable(Item formItem)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<FormResult> formResults = FormResults(formItem.ID.Guid);Di2015NewLine    List<Field> distinctFields = distinctFields)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var dataColumn = new DataColumn("_" + field.id.ToString("N"), typeof (string));Di2015NewLine        dataColumn.Caption = field.name.Replace(" ", "_");Di2015NewLine        dt.Columns.Add(dataColumn);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (FormResult formResult in formResults)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var connection dataRow = dt.NewRow();Di2015NewLine        dataRow["Submission_DateTime"] = formResult.timestamp.ToString("MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss");Di2015NewLine        while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dataRow["_" + reader.GetGuid(0).ToString("N")] = reader.GetValue(1).ToString().Replace("<item>", "").Replace("</item>", "");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        dt.Rows.Add(dataRow);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        reader.Close();Di2015NewLine        connection.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return dt;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic List<Field> DistinctFields(Guid formitemid)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var connection = new SqlConnection();Di2015NewLine 18993146Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ServiceHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static object BuildResponseObject<T>(T typedObject, NameValueCollection queryString) where T: BaseResponseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var newObject = new ExpandoObject() as IDictionary<string, object>;Di2015NewLine        newObject.Add("href", typedObject.href);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(queryString.Get("fields")))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var propertyName in queryString.Get("fields").Split(',').ToList())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //could check for 'socialNetwork' and exclude if you wantedDi2015NewLine                newObject.Add(propertyName, typedObject.GetType().GetProperty(propertyName, BindingFlags.IgnoreCase | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance).GetValue(typedObject, null));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(queryString.Get("expand")))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var propertyName in queryString.Get("expand").Split(',').ToList())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newObject.Add(propertyName, typedObject.GetType().GetProperty(propertyName, BindingFlags.IgnoreCase | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance).GetValue(typedObject, null));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return newObject;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18993786Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void HelloMessageHandler(      HelloMessage      msg ) { ... }Di2015NewLineprivate void GoodByeMessageHandler(    GoodByeMessage    msg ) { ... }Di2015NewLineprivate void HowYaDoingMessageHandler( HowYaDoingMessage msg ) { ... }Di2015NewLine.Di2015NewLine.Di2015NewLine.Di2015NewLinepublic Action<T> GetHandler<T>()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Type t = typeof(T) ;Di2015NewLine  Delegate handler ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if      ( t == typeof(HelloMessage)      ) handler = (Action<HelloMessage>)      HelloMessageHandler      ;Di2015NewLine  else if ( t == typeof(GoodByeMessage)    ) handler = (Action<GoodByeMessage>)    GoodByeMessageHandler    ;Di2015NewLine  else if ( t == typeof(HowYaDoingMessage) ) handler = (Action<HowYaDoingMessage>) HowYaDoingMessageHandler ;Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    string message =  string.Format( "Unknown Message Type specified: {0}" , t.FullName ) ;Di2015NewLine    throw new InvalidOperationException(message);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Action<T> instance = (Action<T>) handler ;Di2015NewLine  return instance ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18993945Di2015UniqueSeparator            //draw an ellipse centered at 200,200Di2015NewLine            g.DrawEllipse(Pens.Red, 195, 195, 10, 10);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //apply translate transform - shifts origin to 200,200Di2015NewLine            g.TranslateTransform(200, 200);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //draw another ellipse, should draw around first ellipseDi2015NewLine            //because translate tranforms essentially moves our coordinates 200,200Di2015NewLine            g.DrawEllipse(Pens.Blue, -7, -7, 14, 14);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //now do rotate transformDi2015NewLine            g.RotateTransform(90f); //degree to rotate objectDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //now, anything we draw with coordinates 0,0 is actually going to be draw at 200,200 AND be rotated by 45*Di2015NewLine            //this line will be vertical, through 200,200, instead of horizontal through 0,0Di2015NewLine            g.DrawLine(Pens.Green, -20,0,20,0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //If we add another translate, this time 50x, it would normally translate by 50 in the X directionDi2015NewLine            //BUT - because we already have transforms applied, including the 90 rotate, it affects this translationDi2015NewLine            //so this in effect because a 50px translation in Y, because it's rotated 90*Di2015NewLine            g.TranslateTransform(50, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //so even though we translated 50x, this line will draw 50px below the last lineDi2015NewLine            g.DrawLine(Pens.Green, -20, 0, 20, 0);Di2015NewLine

18996812Di2015UniqueSeparator// This can be handled any way you want, I prefer constantsDi2015NewLineconst string STABLE_FOLDER = @"C:\\temp\\stable\\";Di2015NewLineconst string UPDATE_FOLDER = @"C:\\temp\\updated\\";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get our files (recursive and any of them, based on the 2nd param of the Directory.GetFiles() methodDi2015NewLinestring[] originalFiles = Directory.GetFiles(STABLE_FOLDER,"*", SearchOption.AllDirectories);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Dealing with a string array, so let's use the actionable Array.ForEach() with a anonymous methodDi2015NewLineArray.ForEach(originalFiles, (originalFileLocation) => Di2015NewLine{       Di2015NewLine    // Get the FileInfo for both of our filesDi2015NewLine    FileInfo originalFile = new FileInfo(originalFileLocation);Di2015NewLine    FileInfo destFile = new FileInfo(originalFileLocation.Replace(STABLE_FOLDER, UPDATE_FOLDER)); Di2015NewLine                                    // ^^ We can fill the FileInfo() constructor with files that don't exist...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ... because we check it hereDi2015NewLine    if (destFile.Exists)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Logic for files that exist applied here; if the original is larger, replace the updated files...Di2015NewLine        if (originalFile.Length > destFile.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            originalFile.CopyTo(destFile.FullName, true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }       Di2015NewLine    else // ... otherwise create any missing directories and copy the folder overDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Directory.CreateDirectory(destFile.DirectoryName); // Does nothing on directories that already existDi2015NewLine        originalFile.CopyTo(destFile.FullName,false); // Copy but don't over-write  Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine});Di2015NewLine

18997107Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace BA_LibDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class RTEventHandler<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private EventRegistrationTokenTable<EventHandler<T>> m_EventTokenTable = null;Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<EventHandler<T>, EventRegistrationToken> _tokens = new Dictionary<EventHandler<T>, EventRegistrationToken>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public event EventHandler<T> EventDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            addDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_tokens.ContainsKey(value))Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                var token = EventRegistrationTokenTable<EventHandler<T>>.GetOrCreateEventRegistrationTokenTable(ref m_EventTokenTable).AddEventHandler(value);Di2015NewLine                _tokens.Add(value, token);Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            removeDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_tokens.ContainsKey(value))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var token = _tokens[value];Di2015NewLine                    EventRegistrationTokenTable<EventHandler<T>>.GetOrCreateEventRegistrationTokenTable(ref m_EventTokenTable).RemoveEventHandler(token);Di2015NewLine                    _tokens.Remove(value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Fire(T argument)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            EventHandler<T> temp = EventRegistrationTokenTable<EventHandler<T>>.GetOrCreateEventRegistrationTokenTable(ref m_EventTokenTable).InvocationList;Di2015NewLine            if (temp != null)Di2015NewLine                temp(null, argument);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Fire(object sender, T argument)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            EventHandler<T> temp = EventRegistrationTokenTable<EventHandler<T>>.GetOrCreateEventRegistrationTokenTable(ref m_EventTokenTable).InvocationList;Di2015NewLine            if (temp != null)Di2015NewLine                temp(sender, argument);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18998334Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static FileSystemWatcher fs = null;Di2015NewLine    static string fileName = @"c:\\temp\\log.txt";Di2015NewLine    static long oldPosition = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fs = new FileSystemWatcher(Path.GetDirectoryName(fileName));Di2015NewLine        fs.Changed += new FileSystemEventHandler(fs_Changed);Di2015NewLine        fs.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Waiting for changes to " + fileName);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void fs_Changed(object sender, FileSystemEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.FullPath != fileName || e.ChangeType != WatcherChangeTypes.Changed) return;Di2015NewLine        using (FileStream fs = new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.ReadWrite))Di2015NewLine        using (StreamReader fr = new StreamReader(fs))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0} changed.  Old Postion = {1}, New Length = {2}", e.Name, oldPosition, fs.Length);Di2015NewLine            if (fs.Length > oldPosition)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fs.Position = oldPosition;Di2015NewLine                var newData = fr.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("~~~~~~ new data ~~~~~~\\n" + newData);Di2015NewLine                oldPosition = fs.Position;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19000911Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void AssertNothingWasCalled<T>(this T mock)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var methodsToVerify = typeof (T)Di2015NewLine            .GetMethods()Di2015NewLine            .Where(m => !m.IsSpecialName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var method in methodsToVerify)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var arguments = BuildArguments(method);Di2015NewLine            var action = new Action<T>(x => method.Invoke(x, arguments));Di2015NewLine            mock.AssertWasNotCalled(action, y => y.IgnoreArguments());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static object[] BuildArguments(MethodInfo methodInfo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return methodInfoDi2015NewLine            .GetParameters()Di2015NewLine            .Select(p => Arg<object>.Is.Anything)Di2015NewLine            .ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19004230Di2015UniqueSeparator#import <mach/mach.h>       // Required for generic Mach typedefs, like the mach_port_tDi2015NewLine#import <mach/mach_host.h>  // Required for the host abstraction APIs.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineextern "C" // C, rather than objective-cDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int HWUtils_getFreeMemory()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        mach_port_t host_port;             Di2015NewLine        mach_msg_type_number_t host_size;Di2015NewLine        vm_size_t pagesize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // First, get a reference to the host port. Any task can do that, and thisDi2015NewLine        // requires no privilegesDi2015NewLine        host_port = mach_host_self();Di2015NewLine        host_size = sizeof(vm_statistics_data_t) / sizeof(integer_t);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get host page size - usually 4KDi2015NewLine        host_page_size(host_port, &pagesize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        vm_statistics_data_t vm_stat;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Call host_statistics, requesting VM information. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (host_statistics(host_port,  // As obtained from mach_host_self()Di2015NewLine             HOST_VM_INFO,              // Flavor - many more in <mach/host_info.h>(host_info_t)&vm_stat,                  // OUT - this will be populatedDi2015NewLine             &host_size)                // in/out - sizeof(vm_stat). Di2015NewLine              != KERN_SUCCESS)         Di2015NewLine            NSLog(@"Failed to fetch vm statistics"); // log errorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* Stats in bytes */Di2015NewLine        // Calculating total and used just to show all available functionalityDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This part is basic math. Counts are all in pages, so multiply by pagesizeDi2015NewLine        // Memory used is sum of active pages, (resident, used)Di2015NewLine        //                       inactive,      (resident, but not recently used)Di2015NewLine        //                   and wired (locked in memory, e.g. kernel)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        natural_t mem_used = (vm_stat.active_count +Di2015NewLine                              vm_stat.inactive_count +Di2015NewLine                              vm_stat.wire_count) * pagesize;Di2015NewLine        natural_t mem_free = vm_stat.free_count * pagesize;Di2015NewLine        natural_t mem_total = mem_used + mem_free;Di2015NewLine        NSLog(@"used: %u free: %u total: %u", mem_used, mem_free, mem_total);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (int) mem_free;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19008889Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string SendPost(string url, string postData)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string webpageContent = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] byteArray = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(postData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest webRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine    webRequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    webRequest.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine    webRequest.ContentLength = byteArray.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (Stream webpageStream = webRequest.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        webpageStream.Write(byteArray, 0, byteArray.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (HttpWebResponse webResponse = (HttpWebResponse)webRequest.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(webResponse.GetResponseStream()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            webpageContent = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return webpageContent;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19011927Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SqlServerExceptionConverter : ISQLExceptionConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Exception Convert(AdoExceptionContextInfo adoExceptionContextInfo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sqlException = adoExceptionContextInfo.SqlException as SqlException;Di2015NewLine        if (sqlException != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // 2601 is unique key, 2627 is unique index; same thing: Di2015NewLine            // http://blog.sqlauthority.com/2007/04/26/sql-server-difference-between-unique-index-vs-unique-constraint/Di2015NewLine            if (sqlException.Number == 2601 || sqlException.Number == 2627)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return new UniqueKeyException(sqlException.Message, sqlException);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return adoExceptionContextInfo.SqlException;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19012369Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TSource> ExceptBy<TSource, TKey>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<TSource> first,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<TSource> second,Di2015NewLine    Func<TSource, TKey> keySelector,Di2015NewLine    IEqualityComparer<TKey> comparer = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    comparer = comparer ?? 19014932Di2015UniqueSeparator// Returns min/max/average, ignoring null elementsDi2015NewLineTuple<float,float,float> ComputeStats(IEnumerable<float?> values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     float min = float.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine     float max = float.MinValue;Di2015NewLine     float total = 0.0;Di2015NewLine     int count = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     foreach(var value in values)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        if (value.HasValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            min = Math.Min(min, value.Value);Di2015NewLine            max = Math.Max(max, value.Value);Di2015NewLine            total += value.Value;Di2015NewLine            ++count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     return Tuple.Create(min, max, total / count);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19016406Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<Key> _pressedKeys = new List<Key>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void TextBox_KeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (_pressedKeys.Contains(e.Key))Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    _pressedKeys.Add(e.Key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PrintKeys();Di2015NewLine    e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void TextBox_KeyUp(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    _pressedKeys.Remove(e.Key);Di2015NewLine    PrintKeys();Di2015NewLine    e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void PrintKeys()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder b = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    b.Append("Combination: ");Di2015NewLine    foreach (Key key in _pressedKeys)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        b.Append(key.ToString());Di2015NewLine        b.Append("+");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    b.Length--;Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(b.ToString());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void TextBox_LostFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    _pressedKeys.Clear();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
